GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Get the type of this class.

GetStyle.name: GetStyle
GetStyle.description: Get a style by the style name.

params.name: sStyleName
params.description: The name using which it is possible to address the style.

CreateStyle.name: CreateStyle
CreateStyle.description: Create a new style with the specified type and name. If there is a style with the same name it will be replaced with a new one.with a new one.

params.name: sStyleName
params.description: The name of the style which will be created.

params.name: sType
params.description: The document element which the style will be applied to.

GetDefaultStyle.name: GetDefaultStyle
GetDefaultStyle.description: Get the default style parameters for the specified document element.

params.name: sStyleType
params.description: The document element which we want to get the style for.

GetDefaultTextPr.name: GetDefaultTextPr
GetDefaultTextPr.description: Get a set of default properties for the text run in the current document.

GetDefaultParaPr.name: GetDefaultParaPr
GetDefaultParaPr.description: Get a set of default paragraph properties in the current document.

CreateSection.name: CreateSection
CreateSection.description: Create a new document section which ends at the specified paragraph. Allows to set local parameters for the currentsection - page size, footer, header, columns, etc.

params.name: oParagraph
params.description: The paragraph after which the new document section will be inserted.

SetEvenAndOddHdrFtr.name: SetEvenAndOddHdrFtr
SetEvenAndOddHdrFtr.description: Specify whether sections in this document will have different headers and footers for even andodd pages (one header/footer for odd pages and another header/footer for even pages).

params.name: isEvenAndOdd
params.description: If true the header/footer will be different for odd and even pages, if false they will be the same.

CreateNumbering.name: CreateNumbering
CreateNumbering.description: Create an abstract multilevel numbering with a specified type.

params.name: sType
params.description: The type of the numbering which will be created.

InsertContent.name: InsertContent
InsertContent.description: Insert an array of elements in the current position of the document.

params.name: arrContent
params.description: An array of elements to insert.

params.name: isInline
params.description: Inline insert on not (works only when the length of arrContent = 1 and it's a paragraph)

GetCommentsReport.name: GetCommentsReport
GetCommentsReport.description: Get a report about all the comments added to the document.

GetReviewReport.name: GetReviewReport
GetReviewReport.description: Get a report about every change which was made to the document in the review mode.

params.name: oProperties
params.description: The properties for find and replace.

GetAllContentControls.name: GetAllContentControls
GetAllContentControls.description: Get the list of all content controls in the document

InsertWatermark.name: InsertWatermark
InsertWatermark.description: Insert watermark on each page of document

GetElementsCount.name: GetElementsCount
GetElementsCount.description: Get the number of elements in the current document.

GetElement.name: GetElement
GetElement.description: Get the element by its position in the document.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Add paragraph or table using its position in the document.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the current element will be added.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the current position.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Push a paragraph or a table to actually add it to the document.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The type of the element which will be pushed to the document.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Remove all elements from the current document or from the current document element.<note>When all elements are removed, a new empty paragraph is automatically created. If you want to addcontent to this paragraph, use the ApiDocumentContent.GetElement method.</note>

RemoveElement.name: RemoveElement
RemoveElement.description: Remove element using the position specified.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The element number (position) in the document or inside other element.
